darwin.agentGuidance: Git is pre-installed on macOS (via Xcode CLT). No installation needed. Use system binary.

linux.agentGuidance: Git is pre-installed on most Linux distributions. Use system binary.

win32.agentGuidance: Git is not pre-installed on Windows. Would need to bundle Git binary or direct user to Git for Windows installer.

installInstructions.darwin: Install Xcode Command Line Tools: xcode-select --install
